channel.description: Recent content in Posts on marcus.means.no

item.title: Latest Arch images install cleanly in UTM
item.description: As part of a recent job change, I also acquired a M1 MBP, which is the best one I’ve had in the last 20 years. I’m also a big fan of Linux and tiling window managers, so I was looking to have an Arch wm on the machine and be able to use i3 and get the best of both worlds. Initially when I tried aarch64 didn’t install cleanly from an ISO, and the arch image UTM provides in their gallery is problematic.

item.title: Simply deploying to private GKE cluster from Cloud Build
item.description: I recently came back to Google’s Cloud Platform after some years on other cloud platforms, and as part of my work there I had the requirement to setup a secure GCP cluster for some workloads. Google engineers have provided a nice blueprint for this using a IAP Proxy Bastion host for external access, which works well for safe access from developer machines and allows you to limit Identity Aware Proxy access by GCP Security Groups.

item.title: Enabling touchid for sudo
item.description: Somehow I missed that this is supported, but it’s awesome! Also works with Apple Watch unlock in case your mac/keyboard doesn’t have a touchid sensor :)

item.title: Type clipboard with Alfred
item.description: Ever in a situation where clipboard isn’t operational, say inside two layers of vdi for instance? This Alfred workflow can help!

item.title: Started a new Gaming video channel
item.description: First post shows first five minutes of each game in this months Humble Choice from Hubmle Bundle, running under Linux. More videos to come soon :) Note, the if you prefer, the channel is also available on Youtube

item.title: Zigbee2mqtt
item.description: Finished migrating all my devices from deconz. Much nicer OTA,binding and entity management. Next up zwave. mqtt all the things!

item.title: Sandvika Ice Skaters
item.description: I shot this with my Mavic Pro in 4K. Unusual that it’s cold enough in Oslo for this to be possible.

item.title: Integrating EKS service accounts with AWS IAM
item.description: Been working on setting up a new EKS cluster for work lately, this post shows how to tie together IAM and EKS in a nice fashion using Terraform.

item.title: Giving flickr another go for 2021
item.description: I’m a bit fed up with every social media site turning into tiktok, so I’ve decided to give flickr another go for 2021, so this is where you’ll find my photos for the near future.

item.title: Nice article about Convos
item.description: As some of you might know, I helped start, and spuriously contribute to a web based IRC client called Convos - This post is one of the better introductions to Convos and IRC out there. Worth checking out if you want to learn more :)

item.title: Print of the day - paint stirrer
Prometheus on Nixos
item.description: Great guide to setting up monitoring on your nixos install

item.title: Wiggle
item.description: Have a pesky patch that is only partially correct, and generates some .rej files. Use wiggle to apply the remaining changes in a safe fashion. How did I not know this before?
